Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager extends Object
Manager class for reservations.

    Field

    ReservationManager​(TableManager tableManager, OrderManager orders, ArrayList<Reservation> reservations, ArrayList<Reservation> settledReservations)
    Constructor specifying the table manager, order manager, list of all active reservations, and list of all settled reservations of the restaurant.

      public ReservationManager​(TableManager tableManager, OrderManager orders, ArrayList<Reservation> reservations, ArrayList<Reservation> settledReservations)
      Constructor specifying the table manager, order manager, list of all active reservations, and list of all settled reservations of the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      tableManager - Table manager for this reservation manager
      orders - Order manager for this reservation manager
      reservations - List of all active reservations
      settledReservations - List of all settled reservations

    • findAvailableTables

      public ArrayList<Integer> findAvailableTables​(Calendar bookTime, boolean smoking, int numOfPax, int choice)
      Finds available tables for a reservation.
      Parameters:
      bookTime - Booking time of this reservation
      smoking - Smoking/Non smoking option of this reservation
      numOfPax - Number of people under this reservation
      choice - 0 if normal reservation, 1 if walk‐in
      Returns:
      list of all table numbers available for this reservation

    • createReservation

      public Reservation createReservation​(int contact, String name, Calendar bookingTime, int choice, OrderManager orders)
      Creates a new reservation.
      Parameters:
      contact - Contact number of customer making this reservation
      name - Name of the customer making this reservation
      bookingTime - Booking time of this reservation
      choice - 0 if normal reservation, 1 if walk‐in
      orders - Order manager
      Returns:
      the created reservation
